localString.value: You don't seem to be the sort of person I want to adventure with, perhaps you should find someone more in line with your point of view.
I think you have plenty of help already, no need for me to get in the way.
Sorry, but I am looking for someone with more experience and leadership to adventure with.
Yes, what could I do for you?

element.name: Comment
element.value: Default dialogue when the henchman is a member of the player's party.

localString.value: Are you sure?
OK. I'll just note down all that I'm carrying, and get my bearings.
I wish you had not asked. This is an unfortunate liability to my reputation as a great sorcerer and scholar: my familiar is a slow, nameless bat. I doubt that he will be very useful but here he is.
I wish you had not asked. This is an unfortunate liability to my reputation as a great sorcerer and scholar: my familiar is a slow, nameless bat. I doubt that he will be very useful but here he is.
I always like to prepare for a tough fight with my magic. So what should I do?
Why how completely uncharacteristically wise of you to think ahead like that. I will do so at once.
No thanks. I'm all set for now, and strength isn't everything you know. Then again, maybe you don't know.
Cute little friend, isn't it? And now ready for battle.
Your cute pet already has all the protections I can offer.
Where in all the planes did that come from? I have never seen anything like it, how did you manage to get it? Anyhow, it's now as ready for battle as it'll ever be?
What the...? Um, I dont think there is anything I can do for your "friend".
Well now isn't that most peculiar. I wonder who is really controlling who? Anyway, your "magic pet" is all set.
I am surprised you even have one of those, but it already has all the protections I could give it.
I don't think I have the appropriate spells ready for that. Should we rest?
There you go <FirstName>, now you go get 'em!
Oh I think your tough enough as is, right? Besides you have all the protections I can offer anyway.
No one here needs the protections I've got ready.
Sorry: I've done all I can.
I take it you mean the nearby Death Corpse of <StartAction><CUSTOM3850></Start>. Are you sure you want be to resurrect this person?
I always like to prepare for a tough fight with my magic. So what should I do?
Wise of you to plan ahead. Thanks for reminding me.
No, I think I'm all set for now, thank you very much.
Cute little friend, isn't it? And now ready for battle.
Your cute pet already has all the protections I can offer.
Where did this creature come from anyway? I have never seen anything like it. Anyhow, it's now as ready for battle as it'll ever be?
This "friend" of yours already has all the protections I can offer.
Cute little friend, isn't it? And now ready for battle.
Your cute little pet already has all the protections I can offer.
I don't think I have the appropriate spells ready for that. Should we rest?
You're all set, my dear <FirstName>!
You already have all the protections I can offer.
No one here needs the protections I've got ready.
Sorry: I've done all I can.
The nearest Death Corpse to me is that of <StartAction><CUSTOM3850></Start>. Are you sure you want be to resurrect this person?
I think we're safe enough here.
Very well.
I think we're safe enough here.
Very well.
I will equip the items, then.
What would you like to manage?

Ok, I have <StartAction><CUSTOM3850></Start> gold pieces. It would cost me 950 to pay for a Level 9 Cleric to cast Raise Dead upon you, and 1410 a Level 13 Cleric to Resurrect you, and 6530 for a level 17 Cleric to True Resurrect you.
OK, you now have an empty box.
OK, you now have a box holding my weapons.
OK, you now have a box containing my armor.
I hope you are talking about my inventory.
Very well then.
You think so, do you? Hmph. I'll not help where I'm not wanted, but don't come running back to me the next time you need your shoes tied again.
How embarassing. I'll fix that right away.
How far away do you want me to stay?
Is there anything else?
Why, what is the matter with what I'm doing now?
Very well, but I will still refrain from healing you if I am in close-range combat.
Very well, I will both cast attack spells and heal you whenver necessary.
Very well, I will neither cast attack spells nor heal you if I'm in close-range combat.
Very well, but I will still try to heal you according to your instructions.
Very well, I won't use spells unless we face a challenging fight!
I'll try to do a better job at conserving them.
Magic is an effective way to deal with our enemies. I'll do as you say.
Sounds good. I'll cast when I feel comfortable doing so.
Sure. What would you like me to do?
Very well. I will avoid melee combat unless I am cornered.
They will not catch me off-guard!
Hard to judge, but I'll see what I can do.
OK, I'll wait until the last possible moment!
OK. I will do what I feel is best.
How embarassing. I'll fix that right away.
I will try to heal you even if I am being attacked at close range.
Very well, I will heal you only if I am not in hand-to-hand combat.
Why, what is the matter with what I'm doing now?
Very well, but I will still refrain from healing you if I am in close-range combat.
Very well, I will both cast attack spells and heal you whenver necessary.
Very well, I will neither cast attack spells nor heal you if I'm in close-range combat.
Very well, but I will still try to heal you according to your instructions.
Very well, I won't use spells unless we face a challenging fight!
I'll try to do a better job at conserving them.
Magic is an effective way to deal with our enemies. I'll do as you say.
Sounds good. I'll cast when I feel comfortable doing so.
Of course. When the combat begins I'll still use my spells, but I'll also stay back and attack with my ranged weapons from a distance. I'll switch weapons if the enemies get too close.
Sure. What would you like me to do?
Very well. I will avoid melee combat unless I am cornered.
They will not catch me off-guard!
Hard to judge, but I'll see what I can do.
OK, I'll wait until the last possible moment!
OK. I will do what I feel is best.

element.name: Comment
element.value: This starting condition should only come up if the henchman is working for a player and it is NOT that player who is trying to talk to him (the script NW_CH_JOIN_NOT only checks to see if the henchman is working for ANY player, including the one he is currently serving).

localString.value: Would you like some help in your mission?
Whatever you say then, I wouldn't want to impose.
Very good, <mister/missus> <LastName>. you sure sound like you could use some.
As you wish.
Very good, <mister/missus> <LastName>
Welcome back <FirstName>.
Greetings <FullName>. I have heard tell of your adventures and reputation. I wish to submit myself to your service. Will you accept me as your trusted associate?

Please help me kind <sir/madam>. My master, <StartAction><CUSTOM3850></Start> is dead, and I cannot afford the donation for a resurrection. Can you please give me <StartAction><CUSTOM3851></Start> gold pieces?
Thank you kind <sir/madam>.
Please help me kind <sir/madam>. My master, <StartAction><CUSTOM3850></Start> is dead. Are you able to resurrect them for me?
Ok. Just so happens that I have one right here.
Thank you kind <sir/madam>.
Umm... me forget what me wanted.
I'd like you to make this spot your base.
I'd like you to take stock of your equipment and take note of your surroundings.
You make magic pet go away.
Unsummon your familiar, please.
You get your magic pet.
Summon your familiar, please.
Me want you cast magic stuff
Bah, no more magic talk, me head hurt.
You make magic creature thing for help us in fight.
You too weak, you cast spell make you stong for fight.
You make my animal friend more better
You make my magic friend more better
You make my magic pet more better.
You make magic to make me tough.
We go battle, you make all us strong!
Me see dead people you bring dem back.
I would like you to cast a spell.
OK. I think we're done.
Please summon a creature to aid us in combat.
Please magically enhance yourself.
Please magically enhance my animal companion.
Please magically enhance my summoned creature.
Please magically enhance my familiar.
Please magically enhance me for battle.
Buff the party up for battle with all your spells!
Please attempt to resurrect the nearest body.
You look for stuff to kill, and bash it good, or you come back here.
Scout ahead for enemies. Engage in combat if they are nearby; otherwise return to me.
You tell me what this is.
Please try to identify my items.
I am done managing your inventory.
I would like to manage your inventory.
Never mind.
I'd like to manage your gold.
Give me 100 gold pieces.
Here, have 100 gold pieces.
I would like to give you new equipment to wear.
I'd like to manage your weapons and other equipment.
I'd like to manage your armor.
You show me your stuff.
Please show me your inventory.
No, wait, me still need help.
You go now.
Ummm...Me think you dual-wield weapon not good.
Me want talk how you use combat spells.
Cast combat spells when you grapple with enemy.
No cast spells while you grapple with enemy.
All is good, but save spells. Use them for stronger enemy.
You waste spells. Use them when enemy is medium strong.
Use spells all time! Don't stop unless enemy is weak.
Forget before talk.You do good when use spells.
In fight you use grapple weapon, not far weapon.
In fight you use far weapon, not grapple weapon.
Must talk about weapon-switch...stuff.
No grapple combat. Move from the enemy if enemy get too close!
Aggressive! When enemy get closer than 6 meters, charge!
Switch to melee if the enemy is at medium distance, between 4 and 5 meters away.
You good with missile weapon, wait until the enemy get close, less than 3 meters, before switch to melee weapon.
Trust mind when to switch betwen melee and missile weapons.
Ummm... I think you aren't dual-wielding your weapons correctly.
Heal me even if there are enemies near you.
Do not heal me if there are enemies near you.
Let's talk about how you use your combat spells.
I want you to cast combat spells even when in hand-to-hand combat with the enemy.
I don't want you to cast any spells while you are in hand-to-hand combat with the enemy.
You're doing fine, but I really want you to conserve your spells. I think you should save them for our tougher foes.
You are wasting your spells. Use them only if the enemy is somewhat challenging.
I think you should be using your spells all the time! Don't refrain from using them unless the enemies's just a joke.
Forget anything I've said before. I want you to trust your instincts as to when to use spells.
Let's talk about your weapon-switching tactics.
I don't want you to engage in close-range combat at all. Move away from the enemy if they are too close!
Be aggressive. If you see enemies getting any closer than 6 meters or so, charge with melee!
I think you should switch to melee if the enemy is at a medium distance, between 4 and 5 meters away.
Since you're so good with your missile weapon, wait until the enemy gets relatively close, say less than 3 meters, before you switch to a melee weapon.
I want you to trust your instinct as to when to switch betwen melee and missile weapons.
Me no need no help. Me can do it by me self.
Ya, you help me good?
No, I work better alone.
Yes, I would.
Thank you.
Yes, but I'll need a scroll.
